description: Returns information about the metric stream that you specify.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the metric stream to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the metric stream.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric stream.

nested_items.name: IncludeFilters
nested_items.description: If this array of metric namespaces is present, then these namespaces are the only metric namespaces that are streamed by this metric stream.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The name of the metric namespace for this filter.

nested_items.name: MetricNames
nested_items.description: The names of the metrics to either include or exclude from the metric stream.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ExcludeFilters
nested_items.description: If this array of metric namespaces is present, then these namespaces are the only metric namespaces that are not streamed by this metric stream. In this case, all other metric namespaces in the account are streamed by this metric stream.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The name of the metric namespace for this filter.

nested_items.name: MetricNames
nested_items.description: The names of the metrics to either include or exclude from the metric stream.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FirehoseArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream that is used by this metric stream.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that is used by this metric stream.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the metric stream. The possible values are running and stopped.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date that the metric stream was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date of the most recent update to the metric stream's configuration.

nested_items.name: OutputFormat
nested_items.description: The output format for the stream. Valid values are json, opentelemetry1.0, and opentelemetry0.7. For more information about metric stream output formats, see Metric streams output formats.

nested_items.name: StatisticsConfigurations
nested_items.description: Each entry in this array displays information about one or more metrics that include additional statistics in the metric stream. For more information about the additional statistics, see CloudWatch statistics definitions.

nested_items.name: IncludeMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of metric name and namespace pairs that stream the additional statistics listed in the value of the AdditionalStatistics parameter. There can be as many as 100 pairs in the array.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the metric.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: AdditionalStatistics
nested_items.description: The list of additional statistics that are to be streamed for the metrics listed in the IncludeMetrics array in this structure. This list can include as many as 20 statistics.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IncludeLinkedAccountsMetrics
nested_items.description: If this is true and this metric stream is in a monitoring account, then the stream includes metrics from source accounts that the monitoring account is linked to.
